mapper.select: select n.*,c.child_name,l.notice_log_id, l.is_read, t.teacher_name as send_name,l.join_status, l.vote from abjy_tb_notice n , abjy_tb_notice_log l, abjy_tb_teacher t, abjy_tb_child c where l.notice_id = n.notice_id and l.target_id = c.child_id and t.teacher_id = n.teacher_id and n.is_delete = 0 and l.parent_id = #{parentId} order by l.is_read, n.create_time desc

select n.*,t.teacher_name as send_name,k.kindergarten_name,l.notice_log_id,l.target_id,l.join_status, l.vote,ch.child_name from abjy_tb_notice n, abjy_tb_teacher t,abjy_tb_notice_log l, abjy_tb_kindergarten k, abjy_tb_child ch where n.teacher_id = t.teacher_id and t.kindergarten_id = k.kindergarten_id and n.notice_id = l.notice_id and l.parent_id = #{parentId} and ch.child_id = l.target_id and n.is_delete = 0 and l.notice_log_id = #{noticeLogId}
